product.name: SaniteModar Linear Shower Drain, Shower Drain 24 inch High Water Flow Removable Grate, Brushed 304 Stainless Steel Linear Drain with Hair Strainer, Adjustable Leveling Feet
product.description:
At SaniteModar, we truly believe everyone deserves a better life. So, we've made it our goal to serve each and every person by offering a range of Home Improvement items that modern and  functional
We truly believe that we help you live a modern enjoy life through our products, whether you need shower drain or bathroom faucet，etc
As a customer, you are our top priority. So, we aim to offer you the best shopping experience possible by improving everything we do, from product research and development to quality control and customer support.
Linear Shower Drain is made of high quality 304 stainless steel,the special production technology to prevent corrosion and rust
x-shaped design of the linear shower drain ensures that water flows quickly to the central drain, reducing residual moisture at the bottom
product.bullet_points:
• Specification: Linear Shower Drain Size: 24 x 2.8 x 2.5" The diameter of outlet is 2", high displacement with an average of 60 l/min without filter mesh
• Shower Drain Material: Linear Drain is made of high quality AISI 304 stainless steel,the special production technology to prevent corrosion and rust
• Shower Drain Specification Design: The internal x-shaped design ensures that water flows quickly to the central drain, reducing residual moisture at the bottom. It can be used in bathrooms, kitchens and other areas
• Easy to Install and Clean: Shower Drain 24 inch comes with two adjustable feet ,It can solve the installation problem effectively caused by the unevenness of the ground.After using for a period of time, open the panel of linear shower drain and take the filter mesh out. Washing the filter mesh with water
